message: Let's split it 60-40, fair and square!
You wanted 60-40, I'll give you 55-45, it's a fair compromise!
You're getting greedy, Bob! I'll give you a big chunk, but I need something for myself!
I'll give you a small slice, but you're getting less and less with each round!
You're getting too greedy, Bob! I'll give you most of it, but I need some crumbs!
I'll give you a tiny piece, but don't expect me to go easy on you!
I'll take whatever's left, I guess. You win this round, Bob!
